name: Yearning for Spring
description:
Warm layers for snow? Check.

Granola bars? Check. 

Cocoa mix? Check

A big gay heart ready for love? Check.

Bea -- a city girl who loves snow -- goes on a vacation to a snowy mountain to hike the trails and soak in the serene late winter landscape. She meets Camellia -- a regal woman with an air of mystery -- when she wanders off the trail. 

What could go wrong? 

Features: 

  • 1 Cocoa Enthusiast
  • 1 Cold Lady
  • 1 Winter Romance 
  • 2 Gay Hearts
  • Lots of Snow

Developed for WinterJam2020 hosted by Katy133

Credits:

  • TundraFlame (@tundraflame) - Programmer, Editor, Director
  • Angela Geiss (@secondshow) - Sound Designer & Music Composer
  • Sayumi101 (@sayumi101) - GUI Designer & Developer
  • Rebecca Lieberwirth (@beccaliebe) - Background Artist
  • T. Chase (@chasecubed, itch.io, twitter) - Character Artist, CG Artist, Writer, Programming Assistant
